title: ZBrush: Sculpting A 3D Dragon
headline: Master key techniques to skillfully create a high-quality dragon using ZBrush and Photoshop in this free online course.
description: This course will teach you how to create a dragon’s head in ZBrush and edit the final image in Photoshop. Discover the entire sculpting process as well as the rendering and compositing of the final image. Every step of the tutorial is explained using videos that are easy to follow. This is a perfect course for beginners and intermediate users looking to improve their sculpting skills and speed up their workflow.

courseDescription:
The term ‘computer graphics’ or ‘CG’ covers everything from games, movies, virtual reality and anything that deals with digital visual content. Therefore the opportunities available in the world of 3D-CG are endless. You could end up working on the newest Marvel movie, making your own indie game or creating the next Nike advertising campaign. This course delves into the computer graphic field and focuses on concept creation, a major part of any creative workflow and the first step in building new ideas. Throughout the years spent in the video game industry, our instructor has taught many students and created courses that introduce them to the world of computer graphics. Since then, many of these students have joined famous companies or started their own businesses. You will be introduced to the skills required to reach such goals and the tools to push those skills to the next level in your career.

Throughout the progress of this course, the teacher will show you the basic setup and brushes you will use and most likely need for future projects. Keep in mind that all the brushes shown here are indispensable tools that are used by all professional ZBrush users. You will be able to work with many tools to help you create a highly detailed and quality creature. Next, you will explore how to design your creature's basic shapes and forms. This phase is very important to create a solid base for the rest of your beast. In order to keep your project neat and tidy, you will learn to work with multiple subtools. As you get closer to completing the high-resolution model, the final step is to go through sculpting and detailing. In the last section of the tutorial, you will discover how to render your creation in ZBrush and export those renders to Photoshop for the final compositing of the image.

Once you have completed this course, you will create stunning concepts and become adept at presenting your creations in the best possible way. So, whether you are changing careers, looking for a vocation or are already actively studying computer graphics, this course is for you! The instructor created this course for convenience and usefulness. They have carefully designed each section to help you learn the material in a matter of hours and increase your chance to become acquainted with the tools and different brushes simply and effectively. By studying this course, you will especially benefit from the instructor’s experience creating professional art creatures and handling the software. So don't delay: an opportunity awaits to expand your knowledge in this high-demand field. The sooner you start, the quicker you will reach your goals and become a professional 3D modeller.
